# ExternalPurchaseCustomLink.NoticeType

**Enumeration**

The custom link out style that informs the type of disclosure notice to display.

## Declaration

```swift
enum NoticeType
```

## Overview

Provide a notice type value when you call [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/ExternalPurchaseCustomLink/showNotice(type:)].

## Getting notice types

- **ExternalPurchaseCustomLink.NoticeType.browser**: A notice type that indicates your app displays external purchases in a destination of your choice.
- **ExternalPurchaseCustomLink.NoticeType.withinApp**: A notice type that indicates that you display the destination in a web view or native experience within the app.

## Displaying the disclosure sheet

- **showNotice(type:)**: Displays the system disclosure notice sheet and asks the customer whether to continue.
- **ExternalPurchaseCustomLink.NoticeResult**: The result of showing the disclosure notice.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
